title: Anyone getting weird champ select crashes?
body:
Crashed cause someone was spamming que up with a wait.
Crashed when I had a abilities tab open going into champ select.
Crashed when I had masteries open and it switched to my turn to picka champ.

replies.body: Issues like this is usually caused by either a connection issue or use of third party programs.  Your specific case sounds like programs, so If you have any apps running like play.tv or overlays then remove them for the fix.  Let me know if that helps!
